title: What Parents Say
subtitle: Join thousands of happy families who trust Zora for their children's education

testimonials.name: Sarah Ahmed
testimonials.content: My children have become so engaged with learning since we started using Zora. The AI adapts perfectly to their individual needs and they actually look forward to studying now!

testimonials.name: Mohammed Al-Rashid
testimonials.content: The AR experiences are incredible. My son was struggling with science, but after using Zora's virtual labs, his grades have improved significantly.

testimonials.name: Fatima Hassan
testimonials.content: The parent dashboard gives me complete visibility into my daughter's progress. I know exactly where she excels and where she needs help. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Omar Khalifa
testimonials.content: Zora has transformed how my kids learn. The personalized approach means they're never bored or overwhelmed - always challenged just right.

testimonials.name: Aisha Mirza
testimonials.content: The family plan is perfect for us. All four kids have their own personalized learning paths and I can track everyone's progress from one place.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Zayed
testimonials.content: The customer support team is fantastic. They helped us get set up quickly and were always available to answer questions. Great platform!
